articles.description: New Reading FC interim manager Paul Ince oversaw a victory in his first game in charge of the club on Tuesday night as Royals saw off Birmingham City 2-1 in the Championship
articles.content:
Paul Ince says he could dip into the free agent market to sign a defender for Reading FC in the coming weeks. 
The interim manager's comments come amid the news left-back and Chelsea loanee Baba Rah… [+3116 chars]

articles.title: Manchester City goalkeeper's contract situation clear as Bolton Wanderers reveal transfer stance - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: James Trafford is currently out on loan at the League One club
articles.content:
James Trafford has vowed that he would not be interested in returned to Manchester City to merely play under-23s football as Bolton Wanderers would be keen to have him on loan again next season.

articles.author: David Coverdale
articles.title: Russian athletes WILL be allowed to compete at Winter Paralympics next month - Daily Mail
articles.description: 'The IPC is in dialogue with both the Ukrainian and Russian Paralympic Committees ahead of the Beijing 2022 Paralympic Winter Games,' the IPC said in a statement.
articles.content:
Russian athletes will be allowed to compete at the Winter Paralympics next month - despite their government's 'breach of the Olympic Truce'.
The Russian Olympic Committee are sending a team of 71 to… [+1997 chars]
